sentences.en: A tank warfare v 1.2 source code 1. To rewrite the code. 2.
sentences.cn: 一款坦克战v1. 2源代码1. 重新编写了代码.

sentences.en: Can you rewrite them correctly a few days later?
sentences.cn: 几天后,你可以正确地填入涂黑的字 吗 ?

sentences.en: For the so - called strongly regular graphs we shall rewrite the condition in a more attractive form.
sentences.cn: 对于 所谓 强正规的图,我们将把条件改写成更有吸引力的形式.

sentences.en: He undertook to collect and rewrite hundreds of these traditional songs.
sentences.cn: 他开始搜集并改写了几百首这些传统歌曲.

sentences.en: I am afraid you are required to rewrite your paper.
sentences.cn: 恐怕您的论文需要重写.

sentences.en: I intend to rewrite the story for younger children.
sentences.cn: 我想为年纪更小的孩子改写这篇故事。

sentences.en: I'd rewrite the last two paragraphs to make it better.
sentences.cn: 我已经重写了最后两段以使它更好.

sentences.en: I’ll have to rewrite most of the essay.
sentences.cn: 这篇论文大部分我都得重写。

sentences.en: It would be just as well to rewrite your essay.
sentences.cn: 你还是把文章重写一遍.

sentences.en: Kournikova is poised to rewrite the tennis history books.
sentences.cn: 库尔尼科娃决心改写网球史。

sentences.en: Rewrite it in full and submit your draft to higher authority before filing.
sentences.cn: 全部重写,并在存档前将草稿送交上级审查.

sentences.en: Rewrite the sentences below, emphasizing as man parts as possible.
sentences.cn: 改写下列句子, 强调尽可能多的成分.

sentences.en: The only way to correct this is to rewrite the program.
sentences.cn: 唯一的出路就是重写这个程序.

sentences.en: The teacher asked the students to rewrite the text.
The user can erase and rewrite to the disk multiple times.
sentences.cn: 用户可擦除和重写磁盘多次.

sentences.en: You have to rewrite the article.
sentences.cn: 你不得不重新改写这篇文章.

phrases.tran_cn: 重写历史（以符合自己的特定目的）
（体育运动员）改写记录，刷新记录

trans.tran_en: to change something that has been written, especially in order to improve it, or because new information is available
